billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Requires fingerprints and criminal history checks for directors of corporations formed for working with or for benefit of youths
summary: Requires fingerprints (two sets, to be annexed to the certificate of incorporation) and criminal history checks (state and nationwide) of the directors of certain corporations subject to the not-for-profit corporation law that are formed for working with or for benefit of youths.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to fingerprints and criminal history background checks of directors of certain corporations
